actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that a special postage stamp be issued commemorating 200 years of free enterprise in the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee of the United States Postal Service should recommend to the Postmaster General that a special postage stamp be issued commemorating two hundred years of free enterprise in the United States.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that a special postage stamp be issued commemorating 200 years of free enterprise in the United States.
